section.title: Overview
section.para: xTuple POS—otherwise known as xtpos—is an xTuple extension package which may be applied to any xTuple ERP edition. The package is easy to install. And once installed, it seamlessly integrates point of sale functionality with your ERP.
To install xTuple POS, you will need the following items:

listitem.para: This is the package installer. It is a cross-platform application which connects to your xTuple ERP database and installs the xTuple POS package (xtpos). The Updater is the same tool that is used for upgrading xTuple ERP databases from one version to the next. It also converts xTuple ERP from one edition to the next (e.g., PostBooks to Standard).

This is the xTuple extension package which integrates point of sale features with your xTuple ERP. The file is loaded into the Updater, which in turn applies the package to your xTuple database. And like all xTuple database upgrade scripts, the file ends with a .gz extension.

section.title: Getting the Required Files
section.para: If you purchased xTuple POS on the xTuple xChange, then you should already have the files you need—that is, the Updater tool and the xtpos package. We will explain how to install the package in the next section.

note.para: Depending on which edition of xTuple ERP you are running, it may be possible to download the required files from the "Commercial Software" section of the xtuple.org website.

section.para: The Updater tool can also be downloaded from the PostBooks project page on SourceForge.net. To reach the PostBooks project, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Point your web browser to http://sourceforge.net/
The following project page will appear. The details may vary slightly, depending on the version you are downloading:

section.para: Next, select the "View All Files" button. Once you select this button, you will see the full list of all files available for download. The following screenshot shows several of the file folders used to organize the file downloads. Simply click on one of the folders to reveal the available files inside the folder.

tip.para: If at first you don't see the Updater folder on the Downloads page, make sure to scroll all the way down the web page until you find it.

section.para: Finally, select the Updater folder and click on it to reveal the files contained in the folder. Be sure to choose the file which corresponds to your operating system. The Updater is available for Windows, Mac, and Linux, as shown in the following screen:
Once you've downloaded the Updater and the xtpos package, you are ready to begin the installation!

section.title: Installing the Package
section.para: Having xTuple ERP installed and running is a prerequisite for installing xTuple POS. Assuming this is the case, then you are ready to begin.

note.para: Before you install the xTuple POS package, you should first make a backup copy of your xTuple ERP database. This way you can always restore the backup copy should you encounter problems during the installation process.

section.para: To begin installing the xTuple POS package, the first step is to connect the Updater to your xTuple ERP database. The process for connecting is identical to the process used when logging in using your xTuple ERP client software.
The following screen shows the log in screen you are presented with when launch the Updater application:

mediaobject.caption: Connect to xTuple Database Using Updater

tip.para: If you are having trouble connecting to your xTuple ERP database with the Updater, select the OPTIONS button on the Log In screen to ensure your connection information is correct.

section.para: Once you successfully connect to the database, you are ready to load the xtpos package. To begin loading the xtpos package, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Select the "Open" option, as shown in the following screen:

section.para: Once you locate the xtpos package on your file system (e.g., xtpos-3.5.0.gz), a short series of prerequisite checks will be performed. The following screen shows the results of a successful prerequisite check:

If the prerequisite check was successful, simply select the START UPDATE button to complete installation. Depending on the quality of your network connection, this final step of the installation process should complete quickly.

note.para: Contact your system administrator if you encounter errors or extreme slowness after selecting the START UPDATE button.

section.para: To verify the xTuple POS package has been successfully installed, log into xTuple ERP. Finally, navigate to the installed packages directory, using the following path: System > Design > Packages.
